page.title: 13Employment in Stanwell
page.content:
Ackland-Snow is one of the few industries in Stanwell not related to the airport. It was established in 1954 and makes scenery for television. When we went to visit the workmen were making the set for {Bluebell Girls}. Tracy Brown Aged 8yrs
There are between 400 and 500 people working at the Northumberland Trading Estate. The first part of the estate is called Northumberland after the river and the second part is called Blackburn Estate. Buddy Aged 6yrs
The trading Estate is built on good farming land. It's all concrete now. Michael Watson 7yrs
